content:
#!/bin/bash

TOKEN="5532778099:AAF7LHNnG6x8pugXRmIFLqjK9-ycsy9kDDo"
CHAT_ID="@uac_test_bot"
MESSAGE="*Task Name*:SCAN-DATA-FILE-AND-FORMAT *Job status*:FAILED *logs*:**Locating the Input file for SCAN **Input File found and Initiating scan process **Problem in the data records - Verify the input file X---Scan process Aborted---X"
URL="https://api.telegram.org/bot$TOKEN/sendMessage"

curl -s -X POST $URL -d chat_id=$CHAT_ID -d text="$MESSAGE"
